title: For Trade My High Grade T206s for Your High Grade Cobb Portraits
author: RGold

posts.post_title: For Trade My High Grade T206s for Your High Grade Cobb Portraits
posts.post_content:
Looking for PSA or SGC high grade Cobb portraits.  T206, M116, etc. Ex or better.  Centering a must.  Fair deals for both only.

I have for trade the following:

[url]http://imageevent.com/rgold/fortrade[/url]

Email [url]rgold7000@aol.com[/url]  I do not answer PMs.

gorgeous collection of high-grade T206s.  best of luck on your trades.
--S
But I thought a fake PSA rep took all your cards?

Bumped to add a few more cards available for trade.
:D:D:D

[url]http://imageevent.com/rgold/fortrade[/url]
